name: The Noid Finds Love
description:
DISCLAIMER: This game might be a bit too inappropriate for the kiddies.

A game about the troubles in The Noid's sex life. Play as The Noid through 6 challenging* levels

*Levels may not be challenging

Story:

The Noid wants pussy real bad, so he decides to find love by going to the nearest sex club. Unfortunately, after his pizza smashing days he is now being hunted down by Domino's Pizza. Can the Noid get a girl before a pizza company kills him?

Controls:

Arrow Keys - Move The Noid

Z - Throw yo-yo bombs

X - Jump

The Noid belongs to Domino's Pizza
